[{"id":"QCT-1498","entityId":"66-5516","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"Add error handling to qlite"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Govan Marounsi"},{"name":"created","value":"1588874734477"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1498"},{"name":"description","value":"

If result of some commands and requests sent to Qlite is not successful, then Qlite will send and error message beginning with "!". Right now we are not using this information and just ignore it. We can read this information and save it in a property with name of error message (We can add the name of rule to the beginning of the error message.). We have to check which commands sent back error message and add this to all of them.

\n
"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Bengt-Ove Johansson"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"gma"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"boj"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1589964512113"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"QCT-1518","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"QCT-1360","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"QCT-1268","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["In Progress"],"valueId":["In Progress"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Sprint","value":["2020_qct_1_7_1"],"valueId":["2020_qct_1_7_1"],"color":null},{"name":"QCT Branch","value":["maintenance-1.7.1"],"valueId":["maintenance-1.7.1"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"gma","fullName":"Govan Marounsi"}]},{"name":"Estimated Effort","value":["1440"],"valueId":["3d"],"color":null}],"comment":[{"id":"83-6300","author":"vse","authorFullName":"Viktor Selleby","issueId":"QCT-1498","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

The modem can inform us on most error states via the commands: alarm show active unit/rx/tx. These commands have caused communication errors and can because of this only be triggered via the Property Client. When this issue is implemented, the commands should be made periodic again and we should do something useful with the information reported by them.

\n
